data.name: Veggie Menace
data.detailed_description:
During a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, one of the participants tried to cheat by casting a spell to make their vegetables bigger. It fails and ends up bringing the vegetables to life. Due to this situation, the villagers call Megi, a powerful little traveling witch with magic powers in order to protect their hoses and finish with the vegetable’s invasion.

To do this, Megi will need to go through the outside of the village into the main castle trying to find the invasion’s origin and defeat the vegetables that are haunting the villagers, bringing everything back to normal.

Features


  • Cartoony medieval and fantasy-themed 2D run-and-gun platformer
  • Play cooperatively with the supported 2-player Local coop mode
  • Featured abilities: fast speed, quick-dash ability, and powerful magic projectiles!
  • Languages: English, Spanish, Finish, Polish, Catalan, Basque



About Development


This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

data.short_description: After a failed spell during a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, the vegetables come to life and try to invade the civilization. A little witch with her magic powers will need to fight against this invasion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
